subject: Attention; Beneficiary
body:
FROM THE DESK: DR. WILLIAM SHITTU
    DIRECTOR
    FOREIGN FUNDS SECURITY DEPARTMENT
    CASH PROCESSING UNIT
    OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY

    OUR REF: FGN/GOV/OPD/DD43/FGN-554/S334

    DATE: 15TH  FEBRUARY,  2024,


    Attention;  Beneficiary

    With the utmost urgency required for your quick confirmation to the
    change of ownership of your fund, I Dr. William Shittu, the officer in
    charge of all outstanding foreign beneficiaries’ payment approvals in
    this office. I have been instructed by the top authorities to ask you
    if you ever know one Engineer DAVID MOORE and Barrister
    G.C.SCOTT,because they sent a letter of claim to our office that they
    are your relatives and you eventually died in an auto accident some
    time ago including a death Certificate/warrant of your burial, that
    you gave them the power of attorney to claim your fund before your
    death.

    The letter of authorization was supported with a sworn affidavit from
    the Federal High Court Ref: IKJ-LWC43/587/Y2022.which was signed by
    Engineer DAVID MOORE and Barrister G.C.SCOTT, which they stated in
    their claim’s affidavit and declarations, that you gave them power of
    attorney to claim your fund and change all your details to reflect
    Engineer DAVID MOORE particulars.

    There is urgent need for you to give us your confirmation, if you are
    still alive, because we had earlier received the due diligence
    approval order from the Presidency to release your funds and we have
    already commence the fund release process, before we receive the
    counter claims affidavit. Right now, we need your immediate
    confirmation about these claims by Engineer DAVID MOORE and Barrister
    G.C.SCOTT on your behalf, and if we do not hear from you immediately,
    we shall be then convinced that you are dead as stated in the claims
    letter from DAVID.

    Your quick acknowledgment of this message via our email address will
    help us commence investigation and know the truth of this counter
    claims.

    Yours in service,

    Dr.William Shittu
    Director
    Cash Processing Unit
    Foreign Funds Security

subject: Re: Attention; Beneficiary
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprising piece of news! I had no idea that someone would claim such things about me. 

I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. As for Engineer David Moore and the Barrister, I'm afraid I don't know them personally. It's quite puzzling how they could make such claims.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did they come to the conclusion that I was deceased? And what kind of power of attorney are they referring to?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Arthur

subject: Attention; Arthur
body:
FROM THE DESK: DR. WILLIAM SHITTU
DIRECTOR
FOREIGN FUNDS SECURITY DEPARTMENT
CASH PROCESSING UNIT
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY

OUR REF: FGN/GOV/OPD/DD43/FGN-554/S334

DATE: 24TH FEBRUARY , 2024


Attention;  Arthur

We couldn't reply you immediately due to fiat order from the authorities to
investigate the recent attempt to divert your payments and find out any
involvement from the officials in aiding the fraudsters to divert
beneficiaries funds. This was a major crack-down but at the end of the
investigation the security departments discovered One of the officials
 Engineer DAVID MOORE, that are conniving with impostors to divert your
payment funds and they are now standing trials as attach below for your
clarification and payment confirmation.

The authorities has recommended the approval of US$10 million only to be
paid to you, but this payment will processed and paid to you through the
Government approved payee officer in United States of America,Europe and
Asia you need to be present in any one of those states that has been
mention to you, also attach your valid driver's license copies or an
International Passport copies. The requirements are very mandatory to
assist us in the final verification and secured computerization.

You must understand that we are determined to effect your payment release
process immediately you provide the required information. Therefore, we
expect that you wouldn't delay us now that all is set for your payment.
Please you have to stop any further communication with whom so ever from
Nigerian to help us fight the bad eggs in our country.

We will be expecting the required details immediately with your full name
and house address and telephone/mobile and fax number.


Yours in service,

Dr.William Shittu
Director
Cash Processing Unit
Foreign Funds Security Department.
Office of Presidency

subject: Re: Attention; Arthur
body:
Hello Shittu,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm Arthur, as you already know. It's quite alarming to hear about the recent attempt to divert my payments. I hope Engineer David Moore and his accomplices are brought to justice soon.

I'm curious about the US million that has been approved for payment. Could you please elaborate more on this? Also, could you clarify what exactly is a Government approved payee officer?

You mentioned needing my presence in either United States or Asia. Is there any specific reason why these locations have been chosen? 

Lastly, I would like to understand better how my driver's license or passport copies would assist in the final and secured process.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Arthur
